summary: Full-stack engineer with 5+ years building B2B web apps. Experienced with React/Next.js, FastAPI, Postgres, and cloud deployments. Focused on measurable impact: performance, reliability, and developer velocity.

experience.title: Full-Stack Engineer
responsibilities: Built and maintained customer-facing features using React and TypeScript.
Owned API development with FastAPI and integrated third-party services.
achievements: Reduced page load time by 35% by optimizing server-side rendering and caching.
Automated CI pipelines, cutting deployment time from 30 minutes to 8 minutes.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Implemented REST APIs and background jobs for data ingestion.
Collaborated with product and design to ship iterative improvements.
achievements: Improved ETL reliability from 92% to 99.5% through retries and monitoring.
Designed a Postgres schema and indexes that reduced query latency by 40%.
